name: Click Between Frames
description: Allows inputs to register between frames.

soft-toggle.name: Disable CBF
soft-toggle.description: Disable CBF without needing to restart GD. This option does not disable physics bypass if you have it enabled!

safe-mode.name: Safe Mode
safe-mode.description: Disable progress & stats on rated levels.

actual-delta.name: Physics Bypass
actual-delta.description:
Reduces stuttering on some FPS values. Active even if "Disable CBF" is checked.

THIS WILL ALTER PHYSICS AND MAY BREAK SOME LEVELS! DON'T USE THIS IF YOUR LIST/LEADERBOARD BANS PHYSICS BYPASS!

right-click.name: Right Click P2
right-click.description: Use right click for player 2 jump.

mouse-fix.name: Reduce Mouse Lag
mouse-fix.description:
Reduce lag when using high polling rate mice.
Requires CBF to be enabled.
Experimental, may break things.

late-cutoff.name: Late Input Cutoff
late-cutoff.description:
Check for inputs near the end of the frame instead of the start.

Slightly reduces input lag, but also slightly hurts precision. May help if you are experiencing dropped or delayed inputs.

thread-priority.name: Thread Priority
thread-priority.description: Whether to automatically set CBF's thread priority to the highest available.
